def outed(meet, boss):
    return 'Get Out Now!' if (sum(meet.values()) + meet[boss] ) / len(meet) <= 5 else 'Nice Work Champ!'

def outed(meet, boss):
    return 'Get Out Now!' if sum(meet[person] if not person == boss else meet[person] * 2 for person in meet) / len(meet) <= 5 else 'Nice Work Champ!'

def outed(meet, boss):
    return 'Get Out Now!' if sum([ i[1] for i in list(meet.items())] + [meet[boss]])/len(meet) <= 5 else 'Nice Work Champ!'

def outed(meet, boss):
    return 'Nice Work Champ!' if (sum(meet.values()) + meet[boss]) > 5 * len(meet) else 'Get Out Now!'

def outed(meet, boss):
    return 'Nice Work Champ!' if (sum(meet.values()) + meet[boss]) / len(meet) > 5 else 'Get Out Now!'

def outed(d, boss):
    return ['Get Out Now!','Nice Work Champ!'][(sum(d.values()) + d[boss])/len(d)>5]
outed=lambda meet, boss: "Get Out Now!" if sum([meet[i]*(1 if i!=boss else 2) for i in meet])/len(meet)<=5 else "Nice Work Champ!"
